attributes.action: Instruct Parliament and all Local Authorities in England and Wales to follow the example of French Citizens in ignoring EU rulings and National implementation of restrictions on smoking in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has a proud history of independence and resisting interference in our personal lives. Adult smokers should be permitted to enjoy their overtaxed pastime without let or hindrance from an overprotective Nanny State. We request that the Law should be amended so that,where more than four smokers of legal age elect to ignore currently proposed legislation due to come  in to force on July 1st 2007 and smoke legally supplied tobacco products, there should be no interference or charge brought against them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
